account.question: How can I update my personal information?
account.answer: Go to your profile via the user menu in the top right, then click on 'Profile'. You can update your name and email there.

athlete.question: How do I create an athlete profile?
athlete.answer: In your profile, you'll find an 'Athlete Profile' section. If you don't have one yet, click on 'Create my athlete profile' and fill in the required information.

data.question: How can I delete my data?
data.answer: In your profile, in the 'Danger Zone' section, you can delete your athlete profile or your complete account. Warning: these actions are irreversible.

support.question: How can I get additional help?
support.answer: Feel free to contact us by email at levasseur.sten@gmail.com. Our team will respond as soon as possible.
